item.title: Fast Food Fly Tipping, 1st August
item.description:
Fast food rubbish being fly tipped again. This is happening at least once a week on this road now. Please taken a more permanent approach to this. Bags are ripped open by foxes making more mess. As this is food itâ€™s also a health problem for local residents as it attracts pests

item.title: Antisocial behaviour, 1st August
item.description:
We, residents of Elstree Gardens and Kingswood Avenue of Belvedere would like to raise our concern about the person who lives at 39 Kingswood Avenue, Belvedere, DA17 5HN. He comes to drink his alcohol almost every day, urinates and always leaves his rubbish in the woods or in front of our properties. Children are passing there and glass bottles he leaves behind are eventually crashed and this is also where our pets are around. He is always there, some 100m - 300m from entrance from Kingswood Avenue. I have attached findings for last 4 days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingswood Avenue, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large crack and hole in road covering nearly half of the width., 1st August
item.description:
Iâ€™ve been reporting for over 18 months. My house shakes when large vehicles drive over the crack/ hole in the road. It is preventing me from sleeping as it is particularly evident when the busses pass over. Please repair urgently as I also believe this is now affecting the structural integrity of my home.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Wellington Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
